explanation: [0-0] A man is sitting on the wooden floor in a room with white shuttered walls. He is wearing a white short-sleeved shirt and black athletic shorts. He has a ferocious expression and is holding a roll of red tape. There is a Douyin watermark in the middle left of the screen.

[0-8] The man then begins to pull the red tape off the roll and stick it to his leg. He tears the red tape off. The Douyin watermark moves to the lower right of the screen. The man then sticks the tape to his other leg, tears it off, and pats both thighs with his hands to make it stickier.
